scenario","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1114740/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"poolhus"},"dateCreated":"2009-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not A Kevin James fan, this is a positive review","reviewBody":"Never watched King of Queens, never have been a Kevin James fan but always liked him better than his pal Ray Romano. I was coerced into seeing this Mall Cop movie. I give it a 6 out of 10. Now some may say that is a low rating, some may say better than mediocre.....for me who normally does not like this guys type of humor, this is a great rating!!! It was mildly entertaining...for me it gets the extra star to put it at 6 because it's refreshing to see some humor that's not overly sarcastic, deeply degrading to someone else (except the title character), or just downright cruel. This relied on what I call "Bill Cosby" sense of humor. Funny but overall clean. A bit cheesy, but I think that's what Kevin and the screenwriters were going for. Normally I don't get why people think he's funny but in this case, I did get it....and you can't help but like the guy. Without giving any detail, the bar scene for me was one of the most Laugh Out Loud moments in the movie. The way KJ zips around on the Segway is pretty hilarious although because of it's consistency throughout the movie it wears off a bit. I agree with previous reviews of how the villains kind of downgraded the movie a bit. If that was smarter, or those parts were rewritten, it could have been a lot funnier. Another surprising aspect is Kevin's agility, and athleticism. In this particular movie he is very physical (or at least stunt doubles allow him to appear that way) Overall my 6 out of 10 rating should be perceived as a great rating for this movie. I previously never liked this actor, I thought the title was dumb as dirt, and although I always keep an open mind I would be lying if I didn't say that my expectations were very, very low for this. Certainly not as bad as I thought it would be, and not as great as I thought it could have been. Kevin and cast made this a little better than average...and it changed my mind about my hesitation with this guy....I hope someone puts him in a good movie with a great script in the future (better than Chuck and Larry, Hitch). I believe it will do well on cable. One last thing that I must mention was great, at 82 mins...it was just long enough to not overdue what should be viewed as a kinda silly concept.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":104840,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2},"duration":"PT1H31M"}</script><metacontent="

scenario","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1114740/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"poolhus","dateCreated":"2009-01-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not A Kevin James fan, this is a positive review","reviewBody":"Never watched King of Queens, never have been a Kevin James fan but always liked him better than his pal Ray Romano. I was coerced into seeing this Mall Cop movie. I give it a 6 out of 10. Now some may say that is a low rating, some may say better than mediocre.....for me who normally does not like this guys type of humor, this is a great rating!!! It was mildly entertaining...for me it gets the extra star to put it at 6 because it's refreshing to see some humor that's not overly sarcastic, deeply degrading to someone else (except the title character), or just downright cruel. This relied on what I call "Bill Cosby" sense of humor. Funny but overall clean. A bit cheesy, but I think that's what Kevin and the screenwriters were going for. Normally I don't get why people think he's funny but in this case, I did get it....and you can't help but like the guy. Without giving any detail, the bar scene for me was one of the most Laugh Out Loud moments in the movie. The way KJ zips around on the Segway is pretty hilarious although because of it's consistency throughout the movie it wears off a bit. I agree with previous reviews of how the villains kind of downgraded the movie a bit. If that was smarter, or those parts were rewritten, it could have been a lot funnier. Another surprising aspect is Kevin's agility, and athleticism. In this particular movie he is very physical (or at least stunt doubles allow him to appear that way) Overall my 6 out of 10 rating should be perceived as a great rating for this movie. I previously never liked this actor, I thought the title was dumb as dirt, and although I always keep an open mind I would be lying if I didn't say that my expectations were very, very low for this. Certainly not as bad as I thought it would be, and not as great as I thought it could have been. Kevin and cast made this a little better than average...and it changed my mind about my hesitation with this guy....I hope someone puts him in a good movie with a great script in the future (better than Chuck and Larry, Hitch). I believe it will do well on cable. One last thing that I must mention was great, at 82 mins...it was just long enough to not overdue what should be viewed as a kinda silly concept.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":104840,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.2,"duration":"PT1H31M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: In a World..
U svetu
programme.desc:
In a World...: Directed by Lake Bell. With Lake Bell, Rob Corddry, Alexandra Holden, Eva Longoria. An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protégé." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2294677/","name":"In a World...","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NzE0Mzg3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzY2MDY3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1128572/","name":"Lake Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0577329/","name":"Fred Melamed"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1143861/","name":"Michaela Watkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1128572/","name":"Lake Bell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0312478/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374024/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0200164/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1128572/","name":"Lake Bell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3460998681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5ODMwODQ4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODY4ODk2OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5ODMwODQ4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODY4ODk2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An underachieving vocal coach is motivated by her father, the king of movie-trailer voice-overs, to pursue her aspirations of becoming a voiceover star. Amidst pride, sexism and family dysfunction, she sets out to change the voice of a generation."},"datePublished":"2013-09-13","description":"An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protégé.","keywords":"female empowerment,voice artist,father daughter rivalry,sister sister relationship,father daughter relationship","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2294677/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"christine-705-717153"},"dateCreated":"2014-03-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A movie that offers so many mirrors of yourself to look into","reviewBody":"You have to see In a World — if for no other reason, it's the perfect story to explain to someone the glass ceiling faced by most women. In a World is genius. It's brilliant, amazingly well written, and filled with all kinds of nuances that speak to our lives and what is right and wrong with them. Family issues. Sibling connections. Loving someone out of your league. Commitment and its challenges. Self confidence. Need I go on? Rarely will you go to a movie that offers so many mirrors of yourself to look into. Thank you, Lake Bell.

So, who is Lake Bell and where did she come from? This movie is in the Juno category, and even if it's a one-shot wonder, I want to know this person who is behind it.

It took me a good ten minutes to figure out where I'd seen Lake Bell before. Then it hit me. She's the dragon tattoo lady married to Meryl's ex in It's Complicated. I was stunned. It's so rare to see someone on the screen who can be more than one persona. When I realized she'd written it, directed it, and starred in it, I was blown away. Blown away, I tell you. I have very little desire to meet Hollywood players, but I would have lunch with Lake. Dinner. Breakfast. Tell me where and when, and I'll be there. I want to pick her brain. What made her think of it? What was her father like? Has she done voice-overs? Oh my, maybe we should spend a weekend at Canyon Ranch? One meal isn't enough time.

The cast is obscure and perfect. The sisters look like sisters. Rob Corddry, who plays Lake's sister's husband, will tear your heart out. He makes the case over and over again for marrying the nice guy, not the guy who sends your heart into cardiac arrest. Ken Marino, who plays Gustav and has the difficult task of walking close to the line of ridiculous, nails it. There is one weak link, however. Fred Melamed, who plays Lake's father, is off. I'm not sure exactly why, or whether he was playing it the way she directed, but he's not quite believable.

Here is what I love, love, love about In a World: It proves, beyond a shadow of a doubt, that you can make great movies without a star attraction. It proves that there can be many Hollywood writers. It proves that we can rework this industry, and women can have a voice and a place in film. It shows the sheer depth of resources that exist for making films that are unique, compelling, and funny."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31090,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: My Cousin Vinny
Moj rođak Vinny
programme.desc: My Cousin Vinny: Directed by Jonathan Lynn. With Joe Pesci, Ralph Macchio, Marisa Tomei, Mitchell Whitfield. Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0104952/","name":"My Cousin Vinny","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQxNDYzMTg1M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzk4MDgxMTE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000582/","name":"Joe Pesci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000673/","name":"Marisa Tomei"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001494/","name":"Ralph Macchio"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528718/","name":"Jonathan Lynn"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057987/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0731057/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0490958/","name":"Dale Launer"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"My Cousin Vinny","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2744844569","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc2NWI4YjctMWVhMy00MGViLTk5NzQtZGMwYWY3MzQwZWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjc2NWI4YjctMWVhMy00MGViLTk5NzQtZGMwYWY3MzQwZWZhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"datePublished":"1992-03-13","description":"Two New Yorkers accused of murder in rural Alabama while on their way back to college call in the help of one of their cousins, a loudmouth lawyer with no trial experience.","keywords":"trial,pantyhose,lawyer,alabama,jail","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0104952/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lfjeff63"},"dateCreated":"2005-08-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of my favorites","reviewBody":"I can watch this film over and over again. Joe Pesci plays Vincent LaGuardia Gambini, a Brooklyn lawyer who is asked to defend his cousin and friend from a murder charge in Alabama. Marisa Tomei as Mona Lisa Vito, Vinny's girlfriend, deserved the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress, rare for a comedy to even be nominated for anything by AMPAS. I really liked Fred Gwynne as the no-nonsense Judge Chamberlain Haller, a great foil for Joe Pesci's laid back, easy going Brooklyn wise guy. Even his name, Chamberlain Haller, evokes seriousness. A lot of fun, especially the courtroom antics of Pesci. Highly recommended.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":110746,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"duration":"PT2H"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Moj rođak Vinny
programme.desc: Putujući automobilom Billy (R. Macchio) i Stan (M. Whitfield) zaustave se u gradiću Wahzoou i ubrzo budu uhićeni zbog ubojstva. Jedina šansa im je Billyev rođak Vinny (J. Pesci), nesposobni odvjetnik. Dva Njujorčana su optužena da su pri povratku na fakultet počinili ubojstvo u ruralnoj Alabami. Njihov rođak - neiskusni, lajavi odvjetnik koji ne poznaje južnjačke zakone i pravila ponašanja - ih dolazi braniti.

credits.actor: Jeremy Piven, Chris Young, Megan Ward, Jon Favreau, Alex Désert, Gale Mayron, Thomas Mitchell, Matt Ross

programme.title: In a World..
U svetu
programme.desc:
In a World...: Directed by Lake Bell. With Lake Bell, Rob Corddry, Alexandra Holden, Eva Longoria. An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protégé." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2294677/","name":"In a World...","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU0NzE0Mzg3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzY2MDY3OQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1128572/","name":"Lake Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0577329/","name":"Fred Melamed"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1143861/","name":"Michaela Watkins"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1128572/","name":"Lake Bell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0312478/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0374024/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0200164/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1128572/","name":"Lake Bell"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3460998681","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5ODMwODQ4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODY4ODk2OQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM5ODMwODQ4NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODY4ODk2OQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An underachieving vocal coach is motivated by her father, the king of movie-trailer voice-overs, to pursue her aspirations of becoming a voiceover star. Amidst pride, sexism and family dysfunction, she sets out to change the voice of a generation."},"datePublished":"2013-09-13","description":"An underachieving voice coach finds herself competing in the movie trailer voice-over profession against her arrogant father and his protégé.","keywords":"female empowerment,voice artist,father daughter rivalry,sister sister relationship,father daughter relationship","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2294677/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"christine-705-717153"},"dateCreated":"2014-03-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A movie that offers so many mirrors of yourself to look into","reviewBody":"You have to see In a World — if for no other reason, it's the perfect story to explain to someone the glass ceiling faced by most women. In a World is genius. It's brilliant, amazingly well written, and filled with all kinds of nuances that speak to our lives and what is right and wrong with them. Family issues. Sibling connections. Loving someone out of your league. Commitment and its challenges. Self confidence. Need I go on? Rarely will you go to a movie that offers so many mirrors of yourself to look into. Thank you, Lake Bell.

So, who is Lake Bell and where did she come from? This movie is in the Juno category, and even if it's a one-shot wonder, I want to know this person who is behind it.

It took me a good ten minutes to figure out where I'd seen Lake Bell before. Then it hit me. She's the dragon tattoo lady married to Meryl's ex in It's Complicated. I was stunned. It's so rare to see someone on the screen who can be more than one persona. When I realized she'd written it, directed it, and starred in it, I was blown away. Blown away, I tell you. I have very little desire to meet Hollywood players, but I would have lunch with Lake. Dinner. Breakfast. Tell me where and when, and I'll be there. I want to pick her brain. What made her think of it? What was her father like? Has she done voice-overs? Oh my, maybe we should spend a weekend at Canyon Ranch? One meal isn't enough time.

The cast is obscure and perfect. The sisters look like sisters. Rob Corddry, who plays Lake's sister's husband, will tear your heart out. He makes the case over and over again for marrying the nice guy, not the guy who sends your heart into cardiac arrest. Ken Marino, who plays Gustav and has the difficult task of walking close to the line of ridiculous, nails it. There is one weak link, however. Fred Melamed, who plays Lake's father, is off. I'm not sure exactly why, or whether he was playing it the way she directed, but he's not quite believable.

Here is what I love, love, love about In a World: It proves, beyond a shadow of a doubt, that you can make great movies without a star attraction. It proves that there can be many Hollywood writers. It proves that we can rework this industry, and women can have a voice and a place in film. It shows the sheer depth of resources that exist for making films that are unique, compelling, and funny."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":31090,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

There are better films out there, however i still think this movie delivered laughs .. . Vaughn, Bateman, & Favreau did what they do best, and provided audiences with clever and witty performances. Bell, Davis and Ankerman also did a fantastic job. The scenery is beautiful and breathtaking which only complements the movie even further. Granted the story line was a little weak but what were you expecting?

Bell, Davis and Ankerman also did a fantastic job. The scenery is beautiful and breathtaking which only complements the movie even further. Granted the story line was a little weak but what were you expecting? 

This isn't a serious drama nor is it a pasionate romance . .. its a comedy! so loosen up and be prepared to watch a fun flick which measures up and delivers .. .","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":103181,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5,"duration":"PT1H53M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Parole Officer
Ovo nije nemoguća misija
programme.desc:
The Parole Officer: Directed by John Duigan. With Steve Coogan, Emma Gilmour, Susan Jane Tanner, Iain Mitchell. A failed parole officer framed for murder must enlist the help of his former clients to clear his name." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0283534/","name":"The Parole Officer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGY3NWExYTctNTdlYS00MGU4LWE3OTAtMjA5YjZlYmNmM2E5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTMxMTY0OTQ@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176869/","name":"Steve Coogan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372176/","name":"Lena Headey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0319595/","name":"Emma Gilmour"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0241090/","name":"John Duigan"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103974/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103732/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0054201/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176869/","name":"Steve Coogan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0635428/","name":"Henry Normal"}],"datePublished":"2001-08-10","description":"A failed parole officer framed for murder must enlist the help of his former clients to clear his name.","keywords":"manchester england,frame up,man wears eyeglasses,bag of money,video cassette recorder","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0283534/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"leapso"},"dateCreated":"2002-08-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Conventional feelgood caper movie, unconventional lead character","reviewBody":"You've seen similar plots, characters, tension/release "will the good guys prevail against unbelievable odds" elements if you've seen any movies at all. But you probably haven't seen too many lead characters like Steve Coogan's rather ungifted parole officer in this. 

Coogan specialises in 'little' English characters (though quite a diverse range over his career) - graceless, irritating, of terrific drive but little achievement, and prone to finding the greatest possible embarrassment and humiliation in any situation. They're somewhat like Michael Palin's favourite type of characters (if you know Eric Olthwaite from the TV series "Ripping Yarns" that's probably one of his) but Palin had more affection for them as a rule. 

Somewhat unusually for Coogan he displays a certain affection for his parole officer here - he has his triumphs - but this is a more conventional kind of entertainment than Coogan is normally prone to. 

It really is just a feelgood comedy caper movie, with a stand-out lead character, but the feelgood stuff is done pretty slickly, and the protagonist is invariably hilarious - Coogan is funny every time he puts himself at the centre of a scene. 

I can understand why other long-term Coogan fans are surprised or disappointed about the conventional nature of this movie, as opposed to his TV work. But I think "The Parole Officer" achieves everything it intended to. Steve Coogan is an exceedingly talented man."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

But you probably haven't seen too many lead characters like Steve Coogan's rather ungifted parole officer in this. 

Coogan specialises in 'little' English characters (though quite a diverse range over his career) - graceless, irritating, of terrific drive but little achievement, and prone to finding the greatest possible embarrassment and humiliation in any situation. They're somewhat like Michael Palin's favourite type of characters (if you know Eric Olthwaite from the TV series "Ripping Yarns" that's probably one of his) but Palin had more affection for them as a rule. 

Somewhat unusually for Coogan he displays a certain affection for his parole officer here - he has his triumphs - but this is a more conventional kind of entertainment than Coogan is normally prone to. 

It really is just a feelgood comedy caper movie, with a stand-out lead character, but the feelgood stuff is done pretty slickly, and the protagonist is invariably hilarious - Coogan is funny every time he puts himself at the centre of a scene. 

I can understand why other long-term Coogan fans are surprised or disappointed about the conventional nature of this movie, as opposed to his TV work. But I think "The Parole Officer" achieves everything it intended to. Steve Coogan is an exceedingly talented man.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6595,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"duration":"PT1H33M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Death at a Funeral
Smrt na sprovodu
programme.desc: Death at a Funeral: Directed by Frank Oz. With Matthew Macfadyen, Keeley Hawes, Andy Nyman, Ewen Bremner. Chaos ensues when a man tries to expose a dark secret regarding a recently deceased patriarch of a dysfunctional British family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0795368/","name":"Death at a Funeral","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE4OTIyNTM1MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjUzNTg0MQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0532193/","name":"Matthew Macfadyen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0227759/","name":"Peter Dinklage"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001971/","name":"Ewen Bremner"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000568/","name":"Frank Oz"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015447/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0041237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0208384/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1918877/","name":"Dean Craig"}],"datePublished":"2008-04-09","description":"Chaos ensues when a man tries to expose a dark secret regarding a recently deceased patriarch of a dysfunctional British family.","keywords":"dark comedy,black comedy,ensemble comedy,ensemble film,funeral","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0795368/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"catalina_140"},"dateCreated":"2007-11-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"quality humour","reviewBody":"It's been ages since I had such a good time enjoying a movie. While other movies about dysfunctional families are so dramatic and serious, Death at a Funeral makes things brighter and funnier even at a funeral. The characters are not complex, but various - an accidentally drugged men, a hurting widow, a famous writer and his brother who cannot escape the other one's glorious shade, a hypochondric young men, a sever father, a sour old men, a homosexual blackmailer... and much, much chaos. This antithesis between life, with its different forms of manifestation, and death makes Death at a Funeral a juicy mild-black comedy.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":111095,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

Joy

Joy is the story of the title character, who rose to become founder and matriarch of a powerful family business dynasty." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2446980/","name":"Joy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzRiOWZmMzUtZTJiOC00MjQ1LTkwMjgtNzhlYzBmODAzYTA0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Biography","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2225369/","name":"Jennifer Lawrence"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0177896/","name":"Bradley Cooper"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0751102/","name":"David O. Russell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017497/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323215/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022730/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0751102/","name":"David O. Russell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1754239/","name":"Annie Mumolo"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":""Success"","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4091916825","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNzk4MjE4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzYzMDczNzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNzk4MjE4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzYzMDczNzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Joy is the story of a family across four generations and the woman who rises to become founder and matriarch of a powerful family business dynasty."},"datePublished":"2015-12-30","description":"Joy is the story of the title character, who rose to become founder and matriarch of a powerful family business dynasty.","keywords":"female inventor,sales pitch,parking lot,k mart,female name in title","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2446980/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moveebuff1953"},"dateCreated":"2017-08-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"More than I was expecting","reviewBody":"I was not drawn to Joy when it was first released because it just looked like a made for TV movie. I was surprised when Jennifer Lawrence was nominated for an Academy Award for her performance and still had no real desire to see Joy. Joy popped up on my new releases list on Apple TV today so I thought I would just watch the first 10 minutes to get an idea whether it would be watching or not. After 10 minutes I knew this was worth watching so my husband and I watched it and to both of our surprise we really liked it. Jennifer Lawrence was outstanding in her role as Joy. I've always thought Lawrence was an amazing actress since I saw her in Winter's Bone. She is the real deal. She is destined for more success with each film she is in. DeNiro is amazing as always. It is a wonderful story that should have received better reviews. I can understand why it wasn't a box office hit but it is definitely worth watching.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":130207,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Stalingrad
Staljingrad
programme.desc: Directed by Fedor Bondarchuk. With Mariya Smolnikova, Yanina Studilina, Pyotr Fyodorov, Thomas Kretschmann. A group of Russian soldiers fight to hold a strategic building in their devastated city against a ruthless German army, and in the process become deeply connected to two Russian women who have been living there.

programme.title: L.627
L.627
programme.desc: L.627: Directed by Bertrand Tavernier. With Didier Bezace, Jean-Paul Comart, Charlotte Kady, Jean-Roger Milo. This gritty police drama shows us the underbelly of the Parisian drug trade. Lulu is a tough streetwise narcotics cop who, like a Frank Serpico or a Dirty Harry Callahan, doesn't play by the rules or kowtow to his weak and/or corrupt superiors. Lulu thrives in this violent world, where sheer guts can overcome his squad's deficiencies of money and equipment. Despite the ruthless environment that he lives and works in every day, he still manages somehow to maintain his humanity." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0104658/","name":"L.627","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjczMDMzOTMyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDYxNDkwMzE@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0080020/","name":"Didier Bezace"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0173548/","name":"Jean-Paul Comart"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0434432/","name":"Charlotte Kady"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0851724/","name":"Bertrand Tavernier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0001281/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022244/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0018875/","name":"Michel Alexandre"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0851724/","name":"Bertrand Tavernier"}],"datePublished":"1992-09-09","description":"This gritty police drama shows us the underbelly of the Parisian drug trade. Lulu is a tough streetwise narcotics cop who, like a Frank Serpico or a Dirty Harry Callahan, doesn't play by the rules or kowtow to his weak and/or corrupt","keywords":"drugs,police,police raid,tailing a suspect,feeling stressed","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0104658/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RanchoTuVu"},"dateCreated":"2007-02-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"personalities clash in war on drugs","reviewBody":"A police investigator specializes in busting as many narcotics dealers as he can, but aside from the sad fact that drugs seem to have permanently permeated society, his sincere efforts are often undermined by his own department superiors. Both aspects are very well dramatized. As well, he faces the problem in a more personal way because of his ambiguous relationship with a heroin addict prostitute. At one point his best street informant is exposed by one of the officers in his own police unit, who declares that "you can always find another one". Laying the groundwork, going from stakeout to stakeout and from slum to slum, the film has a gritty authenticity and the main character played by Didier Bezace makes a unique cop who actually believes in what he's doing.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":1806,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"duration":"PT2H25M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: No: Directed by Pablo Larraín. With Gael García Bernal, Alfredo Castro, Luis Gnecco, Néstor Cantillana. An advertising executive comes up with a campaign to defeat Augusto Pinochet in Chile's 1988 referendum." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2059255/","name":"No","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3ODAzNjcwMV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMTUzMjc4OA@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0305558/","name":"Gael García Bernal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0998846/","name":"Alfredo Castro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0954222/","name":"Antonia Zegers"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1883257/","name":"Pablo Larraín"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0132772/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0127070/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0237185/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1425747/","name":"Pedro Peirano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0805073/","name":"Antonio Skármeta"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tráiler [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1808906777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODAzODZiZjEtNWY5Zi00NDU3LWI1NzEtNGZlNDk2YjBlMzkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODAzODZiZjEtNWY5Zi00NDU3LWI1NzEtNGZlNDk2YjBlMzkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"datePublished":"2012-08-09","description":"An advertising executive comes up with a campaign to defeat Augusto Pinochet in Chile's 1988 referendum.","keywords":"campaign,chile,political reform,1980s,dictatorship","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2059255/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"gbacquet"},"dateCreated":"2012-08-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Excellent film. You won't be disappointed.","reviewBody":"First, let me start by saying that some knowledge of the events depicted in this film would come useful. I'm Chilean and lived in the country at the time so I knew what to expect, but foreigners and especially younger audiences might not. Back in 1989, there was a referendum to decide if Augusto Pinochet, Chile's dictator for the past 15 years, would stay on for another 8 or democratic elections would be held instead. The choices were "YES" for 8 more years of military dictatorship and "NO" for democratic elections to be held at the end of 1989. This film is a depiction of the political, social and creative aspects that shaped the ad campaign created by those who supported the option "NO" (hence the title of the film) the problems they faced in creating it and the memorable result achieved. \n\nOf course, there were several other aspects that sealed Pinochet's fate as President besides a creative ad campaign, but this movie is a worthy effort to show how a country really came together and changed its destiny focusing on joy and creativity and trying to leave behind fear and anger. It's filmed video-style which really gives it an 80s look and feel; there are several real-life images and video clips which are a nice treat, because they show what the charged social atmosphere was really like back in those months. You don't need to be a Chilean to like this movie; the script and acting are top-notch and it's not a propagandistic film at all. I actually thought it was pretty objective considering this is really a polarizing subject matter in my country; the audience laughed several times and seemed to truly enjoy it. For film lovers in general, it's an intelligent piece of cinema; for History buffs an objective perspective on how things went down. For everybody else, a fun film to watch regardless. I recommend it hands down.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23765,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

You won't be disappointed.","reviewBody":"First, let me start by saying that some knowledge of the events depicted in this film would come useful. I'm Chilean and lived in the country at the time so I knew what to expect, but foreigners and especially younger audiences might not. Back in 1989, there was a referendum to decide if Augusto Pinochet, Chile's dictator for the past 15 years, would stay on for another 8 or democratic elections would be held instead. The choices were "YES" for 8 more years of military dictatorship and "NO" for democratic elections to be held at the end of 1989. This film is a depiction of the political, social and creative aspects that shaped the ad campaign created by those who supported the option "NO" (hence the title of the film) the problems they faced in creating it and the memorable result achieved. \n\nOf course, there were several other aspects that sealed Pinochet's fate as President besides a creative ad campaign, but this movie is a worthy effort to show how a country really came together and changed its destiny focusing on joy and creativity and trying to leave behind fear and anger. It's filmed video-style which really gives it an 80s look and feel; there are several real-life images and video clips which are a nice treat, because they show what the charged social atmosphere was really like back in those months. You don't need to be a Chilean to like this movie; the script and acting are top-notch and it's not a propagandistic film at all. I actually thought it was pretty objective considering this is really a polarizing subject matter in my country; the audience laughed several times and seemed to truly enjoy it. For film lovers in general, it's an intelligent piece of cinema; for History buffs an objective perspective on how things went down. For everybody else, a fun film to watch regardless. I recommend it hands down.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":23765,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4,"duration":"PT1H58M"</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Tang shan da xiong: Directed by Wei Lo, Chia-Hsiang Wu. With Bruce Lee, Maria Yi, James Tien, Marilyn Bautista. A young man sworn to an oath of non-violence works with his cousins in an ice factory where they mysteriously begin to disappear." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0067824/","name":"Tang shan da xiong","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjUwOTNiZjYtYmFmYy00ZjU2LTg4NDYtNDFhOTk2YzRmNjZjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTExMDY5MjY5._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Crime","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000045/","name":"Bruce Lee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0947935/","name":"Maria Yi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0862875/","name":"James Tien"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516344/","name":"Wei Lo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0156927/","name":"Chia-Hsiang Wu"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0015592/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0516344/","name":"Wei Lo"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Big Boss","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi689944601","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U4NjYzOTYtMzE4MS00YTdhLThiN2YtYWFiMmZiNzcxMmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U4NjYzOTYtMzE4MS00YTdhLThiN2YtYWFiMmZiNzcxMmE5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Clip: Bruce Lee fights thugs"},"description":"A young man sworn to an oath of non-violence works with his cousins in an ice factory where they mysteriously begin to disappear.","keywords":"factory,bruceploitation","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0067824/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lawrence-14"},"dateCreated":"2002-07-17","inLanguage":"English","name":"Referred to here as THE BIG BOSS...","reviewBody":"After years of trying to get into Hollywood, Bruce Lee returned to Hong Kong and began his efforts with this low-budget martial-arts thriller. The result - an Asian box-office smash which made Lee an overnight sensation in the East. Whilst its not a great film or Lee's best work, it is an definite film classic that really opened the door for the martial-arts genre, as well as kicking off Lee's career. The story sees Lee coming to work in Banghok with his cousins in an ice factory, where he soon discovers sinister operations taking place under the thumb of the title villain. Like Lee's other films, the action builds up through the film to impressively staged fight scenes, all topped by a dramatic, all-out climatic bout between Lee and the Big Boss. Breakthrough stuff but the best (and the West) was yet to come.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":25073,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The King of Comedy
Kralj komedije
programme.desc:
The King of Comedy: Directed by Martin Scorsese. With Robert De Niro, Jerry Lewis, Diahnne Abbott, Sandra Bernhard. Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0085794/","name":"The King of Comedy","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTViNjlkYjgtMmE3Zi00ZGVkLTkyMjMtNzc3YzAwNzNiODQ1XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjA0MzYwMDY@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001471/","name":"Jerry Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0007958/","name":"Diahnne Abbott"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000217/","name":"Martin Scorsese"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066289/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0956857/","name":"Paul D. Zimmerman"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The King of Comedy","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3992191257","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTEzYWYyY2QtZGE1Ny00ZTk0LTg5MTUtZmIyYWJmYTExZjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTEzYWYyY2QtZGE1Ny00ZTk0LTg5MTUtZmIyYWJmYTExZjljXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"datePublished":"1983-02-18","description":"Rupert Pupkin is a passionate yet unsuccessful comic who craves nothing more than to be in the spotlight and to achieve this, he stalks and kidnaps his idol to take the spotlight for himself.","keywords":"visual metaphor,freeze frame,narcissism,reference to tina turner,singing","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0085794/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Eclectic Critic"},"dateCreated":"2000-12-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Companion Piece to Taxi Driver","reviewBody":"Travis Bickle from "Taxi Driver" and Rupert Pupkin from "The King of Comedy" are not as unlike as they may first appear. They are men desperately searching for some meaning in their spiritually empty lives, neither man connecting with anyone else; the consequent strain has driven each to his own brand of insanity. Both can be likened to Lee Harvey Oswald-men leading lives of quiet desperation, wanting to do something-ANYTHING-to have SOME impact on the world.

Pupkin is further removed from reality than Bickle (actually Bickle's attitudes about his environment aren't entirely unreasonable) and it's unlikely he could ever be "normal", no matter how much therapy he had. He's lost in his own little world, a world devoid of any real substance. To him, Heaven would be a place where he would exist solely on TV. Real life is too messy.

"The King of Comedy" is the best satire I've seen about the vapidness of society's values and the public's obsession with celebrity. It has its share of funny moments but the overall effect is deadening. Even though things went about as well as Pupkin could have expected in the end, what has he gained? Nothing of any value, though in his delusional mind, he probably would disagree. Ah, Pupkin! Ah, humanity!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":92851,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"duration":"PT1H49M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ljubav i mržnja
programme.desc: Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe... Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe, mržnju. Sve ovo je ipak protkano životom i nenametljivim humorom uz blagu ironiju. Serija "Ljubav i mržnja" zamišljena je u najboljem maniru američke obiteljske serije, sa naizgled definiranim ali zamršenim i nedpredvidivim odnosima između njenih aktera. Tako se ova serija sa svim svojim zavrzlamama kako novac nije garancija za zdravlje i sreću, ali da ga je vrlo lijepo imati i prije svega prikazivati. Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Naša mala redakcija
programme.desc: Kako izgleda radni dan u jednoj novinskoj redakciji? Zgode i nezgode zaposlenih u novinskoj redakciji "Panorama". Kako izgleda radni dan u jednoj novinskoj redakciji? Zgode i nezgode zaposlenih u novinskoj redakciji "Panorama".

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Snovi od šper ploče
programme.desc: Nespretni, dobroćudni učitelj je u stalnoj potrazi za ljubavlju, a njegov komšija želi da se oslobodi svoga braka. Nespretni, dobroćudni učitelj je u stalnoj potrazi za ljubavlju, a njegov komšija želi da se oslobodi svoga braka. Za to vreme, mladi provode dane i dane u lokalnom kafiću komentarišući dešavanja u zgradi...

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Domaća serija Kafanica blizu SIS-a je humoristička serija koja govori o jednoj firmi iz Vlasotinaca, koja se bavi rešavanjem raznih problema koje klijenti svakodnevno imaju. Domaća serija Kafanica blizu SIS-a je humoristička serija koja govori o jednoj firmi iz Vlasotinaca, koja se bavi rešavanjem raznih problema koje klijenti svakodnevno imaju. Gazda firme je cicija i na sve načine izbegava troši pare. Gazda je Spiridon Don Karamarković, čija je desna ruka sestrić Mulja, a tu je i pomoćnica Roza, koja je glavna kada Spiridona nema.

Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Snovi od šper ploče
programme.desc: Nespretni, dobroćudni učitelj je u stalnoj potrazi za ljubavlju, a njegov komšija želi da se oslobodi svoga braka. Nespretni, dobroćudni učitelj je u stalnoj potrazi za ljubavlju, a njegov komšija želi da se oslobodi svoga braka. Za to vreme, mladi provode dane i dane u lokalnom kafiću komentarišući dešavanja u zgradi...

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav i mržnja
programme.desc: Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe... Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe, mržnju. Sve ovo je ipak protkano životom i nenametljivim humorom uz blagu ironiju. Serija "Ljubav i mržnja" zamišljena je u najboljem maniru američke obiteljske serije, sa naizgled definiranim ali zamršenim i nedpredvidivim odnosima između njenih aktera. Tako se ova serija sa svim svojim zavrzlamama kako novac nije garancija za zdravlje i sreću, ali da ga je vrlo lijepo imati i prije svega prikazivati. Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Naša mala redakcija
programme.desc: Kako izgleda radni dan u jednoj novinskoj redakciji? Zgode i nezgode zaposlenih u novinskoj redakciji "Panorama". Kako izgleda radni dan u jednoj novinskoj redakciji? Zgode i nezgode zaposlenih u novinskoj redakciji "Panorama".

Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav i mržnja
programme.desc: Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe... Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe, mržnju. Sve ovo je ipak protkano životom i nenametljivim humorom uz blagu ironiju. Serija "Ljubav i mržnja" zamišljena je u najboljem maniru američke obiteljske serije, sa naizgled definiranim ali zamršenim i nedpredvidivim odnosima između njenih aktera. Tako se ova serija sa svim svojim zavrzlamama kako novac nije garancija za zdravlje i sreću, ali da ga je vrlo lijepo imati i prije svega prikazivati. Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Naša mala redakcija
programme.desc: Kako izgleda radni dan u jednoj novinskoj redakciji? Zgode i nezgode zaposlenih u novinskoj redakciji "Panorama". Kako izgleda radni dan u jednoj novinskoj redakciji? Zgode i nezgode zaposlenih u novinskoj redakciji "Panorama".

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Snovi od šper ploče
programme.desc: Nespretni, dobroćudni učitelj je u stalnoj potrazi za ljubavlju, a njegov komšija želi da se oslobodi svoga braka. Nespretni, dobroćudni učitelj je u stalnoj potrazi za ljubavlju, a njegov komšija želi da se oslobodi svoga braka. Za to vreme, mladi provode dane i dane u lokalnom kafiću komentarišući dešavanja u zgradi...

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav i mržnja
programme.desc: Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe... Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe, mržnju. Sve ovo je ipak protkano životom i nenametljivim humorom uz blagu ironiju. Serija "Ljubav i mržnja" zamišljena je u najboljem maniru američke obiteljske serije, sa naizgled definiranim ali zamršenim i nedpredvidivim odnosima između njenih aktera. Tako se ova serija sa svim svojim zavrzlamama kako novac nije garancija za zdravlje i sreću, ali da ga je vrlo lijepo imati i prije svega prikazivati. Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Naša mala redakcija
programme.desc: Kako izgleda radni dan u jednoj novinskoj redakciji? Zgode i nezgode zaposlenih u novinskoj redakciji "Panorama". Kako izgleda radni dan u jednoj novinskoj redakciji? Zgode i nezgode zaposlenih u novinskoj redakciji "Panorama".

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Snovi od šper ploče
programme.desc: Nespretni, dobroćudni učitelj je u stalnoj potrazi za ljubavlju, a njegov komšija želi da se oslobodi svoga braka. Nespretni, dobroćudni učitelj je u stalnoj potrazi za ljubavlju, a njegov komšija želi da se oslobodi svoga braka. Za to vreme, mladi provode dane i dane u lokalnom kafiću komentarišući dešavanja u zgradi...

Zvezdara
programme.desc: With Igor Djordjevic, Gorica Popovic, Vesna Cipcic, Sofija Jurican. A story set in the Belgrade neighborhood of Zvezdara that follows three sisters of different personalities, and their brother whom everybody likes.

Vila Marija
programme.desc: Villa Maria: With Jelena Veljaca, Damir Markovina, Zarko Radic, Ksenija Pajic. The first-ever Croatian soap opera which follows the lives of three bourgeois families that are tied together, but even more separated by the money, love, passion and betrayal." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0425723/","name":"Villa Maria","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTdmNTdiMWYtZGNhNi00MWVlLWI3NmUtOWIxYTk2NzNmYjBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMjQ1NjEyNzE@._V1_.jpg","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0892563/","name":"Jelena Veljaca"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0548688/","name":"Damir Markovina"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0705577/","name":"Zarko Radic"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0158919/"}],"datePublished":"2004-09-20","description":"The first-ever Croatian soap opera which follows the lives of three bourgeois families that are tied together, but even more separated by the money, love, passion and betrayal.","keywords":"soap opera,father daughter relationship","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0425723/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"akord20042000"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Something I hope the world never sees...","reviewBody":"We loved so much the latino novelas we started making our own novelas,or soaps,whatever... Here is the first one,with some of the most appreciated Croatian actors,and some young and new ones.The veterans are still very popular among people for the great series and movies they made in past,the young ones will be remembered after this,but will not be remembered for the good,well,maybe some of them.The veterans were acting real bad too,so this was just a try to return their old popularity... Didn't work,the acting was to theatrical...So,this is a soap.A very bad soap.A soap that is so campy and trashy you have to see it for it's badness,or avoid it for the same reason... You' ll start to feel uncomfortable with the very bad acting and the even worse production (if you watch it,count the direction mistakes,as flying microphones over the head of the actors and similar!!!).It's the first soap in Croatia and the first series with so many episodes,but is not the first production whatsoever,so this has no excuse!Croatian production isn't the best,but this is the bottom of it... If you're a trash lover,you'll love this... If you're not,avoid this!!!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":228,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1}}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ljubav i mržnja
programme.desc: Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe... Lazarevići su članovi beogradskog "visokog društva" i predstavljaju osim svojih indvidualnostima ono što takvo društvo kod nas podrazumijeva: ljubav, spletke, sreću, nevolje, generacijske sukobe, mržnju. Sve ovo je ipak protkano životom i nenametljivim humorom uz blagu ironiju. Serija "Ljubav i mržnja" zamišljena je u najboljem maniru američke obiteljske serije, sa naizgled definiranim ali zamršenim i nedpredvidivim odnosima između njenih aktera. Tako se ova serija sa svim svojim zavrzlamama kako novac nije garancija za zdravlje i sreću, ali da ga je vrlo lijepo imati i prije svega prikazivati. Cilj serije je da zabavi da gledatelje veže za svoj sadržaj i da prije svega traje.

programme.title: Naša mala redakcija
programme.desc: Kako izgleda radni dan u jednoj novinskoj redakciji? Zgode i nezgode zaposlenih u novinskoj redakciji "Panorama". Kako izgleda radni dan u jednoj novinskoj redakciji? Zgode i nezgode zaposlenih u novinskoj redakciji "Panorama".

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: The Stepfather
Očuh
programme.desc: The Stepfather: Directed by Nelson McCormick. With Dylan Walsh, Sela Ward, Penn Badgley, Amber Heard. Michael Harding (Penn Badgely) returns home from military school to find his mother Susan (Sela Ward) happily in love and living with her new boyfriend David (Dylan Walsh). As the two men get to know each other, he becomes more and more suspicious of the man who is always there with a helpful hand." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0814335/","name":"The Stepfather","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3ODU5OTUwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwOTczNDU2Mg@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Crime","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0046112/","name":"Penn Badgley"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0909620/","name":"Dylan Walsh"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000688/","name":"Sela Ward"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1879589/","name":"Nelson McCormick"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010568/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0094803/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247764/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0136592/","name":"J.S. Westlake"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498839/","name":"Carolyn Lefcourt"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Stepfather - Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2822242841","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0MTA2OTAyMDheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDc0MDE2NzI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA0MTA2OTAyMDheQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDc0MDE2NzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Michael Harding (Badgley) returns from military school to find his mother (Ward) living with her new boyfriend, David (Walsh). As the two men get to know each other, Michael becomes suspicious of the man in his mother's life: Is he really the man of her dreams, or could David be hiding a dark side?"},"datePublished":"2009-12-23","description":"Michael Harding (Penn Badgely) returns home from military school to find his mother Susan (Sela Ward) happily in love and living with her new boyfriend David (Dylan Walsh). As the two men get to know each other, he becomes more and m","keywords":"bikini,ex husband ex wife relationship,abusive stepfather,male bonding,falling through a ceiling","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0814335/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"geniuskentyk-1"},"dateCreated":"2010-07-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"This remake is a pretty solid film by itself.","reviewBody":"'The Stepfather' is a fairly decent thriller and slightly-slasher film in a time where films like this are horribly made. I've never seen the original 'Stepfather' film, but from what I can tell, this remake isn't too shabby. It has strong leads and a decent and straightforward script with good pacing. I loved the introduction of the film, where it explains how the "Stepfather" killer is able to kill a family and get away with it so many times. I like how there's never really a slow or boring part in the film. We like the main son, Michael, and his girlfriend. I think Penn Badgley and Amber Heard were good in their roles. I especially liked Dylan Walsh as the stepfather. Walsh made the character both likable and hated, and made him interesting. I didn't like how clueless the mom was; she's a complete idiot. One of the biggest problems the film had was the actions some of the characters took that didn't make sense. No one would logically marry someone they knew nothing about; it's just unrealistic. And there's one part where the stepfather walks out to his front lawn while there's a bunch of policemen right across the street. If you're a mass murderer on the run, I'm pretty sure you wouldn't make yourself that noticeable to the police. Also, the stepfather should have had the cell phone turned off from the beginning, not when someone's trying to call the cell phone. It's ridiculous. The stepfather's supposed to be a smart and clever guy, but we don't see that when he's with this new family. With all of this said and done, I felt that this remake of 'The Stepfather' didn't offer anything new, but it does entertain. I did like the ending and what happens to the stepfather; I felt it was a fairly good and interesting conclusion to the film. Though the ending may have felt rushed and quick, I was fine with it.\n\nPS: This remake of 'The Stepfather' in a lot of ways felt like 2007′s 'Disturbia' (3 Kents out of 4!). I was constantly reminded of 'Disturbia' while I was watching 'The Stepfather.' However, I like 'Disturbia' more and think it was made better and more interesting. The third act of 'Disturbia' wasn't great, though, which I think the remake of 'The Stepfather' succeeds in – having the film go through a constantly interesting pace.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":32384,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="
